0.ngo_name: RANGDOM GONPA CULTURAL AND WELFARE SOCIETY

registeration_info.nr_orgName: RANGDOM GONPA CULTURAL AND WELFARE SOCIETY
registeration_info.nr_add: Rangdum Labrang Near Polo Ground Leh Ladakh 194101

source_info.purpose:
The society took all possible action and succeeded in getting grant-in-aid from the Government of India, Ministry of Culture, Department of Culture New Delhi for repairs and renovation of the existing building of the own resources of the gonpa being petty did not suffices further expansion and the own resources of the Gonpa being limited, further needed steps could not be taken.
In view of the new scheme for financial assistances to voluntary organizations etc. for purchase listing, cataloging.
